briefTitle: Study Evaluating the Clinical Benefit of SEROQUEL XR in Subjects With Schizophrenia
officialTitle: A Multicentre, Open-label, Prospective Long-term Study Evaluating the Clinical Benefit and Effectiveness of SEROQUEL XR® (Quetiapine Fumarate Extended-Release Tablets) in Subjects With Schizophrenia
summary: A Multicentre, Open-label, Prospective Long-term Study Evaluating the Clinical Benefit and Effectiveness of SEROQUEL XR® (Quetiapine Fumarate Extended-Release Tablets) in Subjects with Schizophrenia.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Subjects With Improved Clinical Benefit From Assessment of Clinical Global Impression-Clinical Benefit (CGI-CB) Scale From Baseline to Week 24 or End of Study
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Baseline to 24 weeks (or end of study)
